conbody.p: Ginger may have anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, and antiviral properties
Ginger is in the family Zingiberaceae, which also includes turmeric (Curcuma longa),[4] cardamom (Elettaria cardamomum), and galangal.
Similar foods: orka, strawberry, lime, rhuburb stalks, quinoa, sweet potatoes, pumpkin seeds milk
